sourceDesc.bibl: Dunedin Public Lib. (C: TxU:H/L-0290; Reel 1054 & RS Sa.668)

abstract.p: Sends RO a note from G. B. Airy on the inadvisability of having a meteorological observatory in Peking. JH agrees with Airy. When William Whewell arrives for a visit, JH will seek his advice.
